summary: The Mehra family must contemplate over their way of living and their love lives while on a cruise celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Shefali Shah|Priyanka Chopra|Ranveer Singh|Anushka Sharma|Farhan Akhtar|Rahul Bose|Zarina Wahab|Vikrant Massey|Yousaf Bokhari Bustamante|Ozge Cagaloglu|Pawan Chopra|Hale Cigek|Khushi Dubey|Jonathan Alonso Flete|Celil Gezer|Sarah Hashmi|Yaprak Piren Karpuzoglu|Aamir Khan|Ikhlaq Khan|Emrah Kolukisaoglu|Martijn Kuiper|Preeti Mamgain|Dolly Minhas|Manoj Pahwa|Vivienne Pocha|Ayesha Raza|Ivan Rodrigues|Vandana Sajnani|Ariadna Santana|Kenya Alexia Sauder Scolamieri|Parmeet Sethi|Debanshi Shah|K.C. Shankar|Shireesh Sharma|Avneet Singh|Krantikari Singh|Shivrama Singh|Ridhima Sud|Sunil|Kallirroi Tziafeta|Abdul Quadir Amin
keywords: wedding anniversary|cruise|dog's point of view|brother sister relationship|dysfunctional marriage
title: Dil Dhadakne Do
